Definition at line 166 of file GrUtil.h.

enum EGRSTENCILMODE

Enumerator:
ESM_ZFAILINCR 
ESM_ZFAILDECR  increments the stencil if the z-test fails for back faces.
ESM_ZPASSINCR  decrementss the stencil if the z-test fails for front faces.
ESM_USESTENCIL  increments the stencil if the z-test passes for front faces.
EGRSTENCILMODE_DWORD  uses the stencil buffer to render ( renders to areas where stencil>0 ).

Definition at line 76 of file GrUtil.h.

ETF_R_RGTC1

ETF_RG_RGTC2  red.
ETF_RG_RGTC2_SIGNED  red-green.
ETF_DEPTH  red-green.
ETF_DEPTHSTENCIL 
ETF_COUNT  invalid texture format.
